section.title: Profiles Tab
section.para: This tab allows you to tell Glider to load a new profile or profile group. In order to utilize this feature, you must first run Profiler.jar. For the exact details, see the loading profiles chapter for more details.
In order to load a new profile, browse to its location in the tree list, select it, and click the "Load Selected Profile" button. You will need to separately press the "Start Glide" button.

note.para: You cannot load a new profile unless Glider is stopped.

tip.para: You can also load a profile by clicking the "Manually Enter Profile To Load" button and then entering the full path to the profile you wish to load. This profile must exist on the computer that Glider is running on and you must provide the exact path.
